books.title: Feeling Good: The New Mood Therapy
books.author: David D. Burns
books.description: A classic book on cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) techniques to manage depression and anxiety.

books.title: The Noonday Demon: An Atlas of Depression
books.author: Andrew Solomon
books.description: An in-depth exploration of depression, combining personal narrative and scientific insights.

books.title: Reasons to Stay Alive
books.author: Matt Haig
books.description: A personal memoir offering hope and insights for those struggling with depression and suicidal thoughts.

books.title: The Anxiety and Phobia Workbook
books.author: Edmund J. Bourne
books.description: A comprehensive guide with practical exercises for managing anxiety and panic disorders.

books.title: An Unquiet Mind: A Memoir of Moods and Madness
books.author: Kay Redfield Jamison
books.description: A personal account of living with bipolar disorder, offering insights into mood swings and mania.

books.title: I Hate You—Don't Leave Me: Understanding the Borderline Personality
books.author: Jerold J. Kreisman & Hal Straus
books.description: Explains borderline personality disorder, focusing on mood instability and fear of abandonment.

books.title: The Upward Spiral: Using Neuroscience to Reverse the Course of Depression
books.author: Alex Korb
books.description: Uses neuroscience to provide practical strategies for overcoming depression.

books.title: Daring Greatly: How the Courage to Be Vulnerable Transforms the Way We Live
books.author: Brené Brown
books.description: Explores vulnerability and shame, offering tools for managing anxiety and stress.

books.title: The Dialectical Behavior Therapy Skills Workbook
books.author: Matthew McKay, Jeffrey C. Wood, & Jeffrey Brantley
books.description: Practical DBT exercises for managing borderline personality disorder and emotional instability.

books.title: The Happiness Trap: How to Stop Struggling and Start Living
books.author: Russ Harris
books.description: Uses Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT) to address depression and anxiety.

books.title: الخروج من الاكتئاب: رحلة إلى النور
books.author: محمد طه
books.description: كتاب عربي يقدم نصائح عملية للتغلب على الاكتئاب باستخدام تقنيات علم النفس الحديثة.

books.title: القلق النفسي: كيف تتغلب عليه؟
books.author: عبد الرحمن ذاكر الهاشمي
books.description: كتاب عربي يركز على استراتيجيات عملية لإدارة القلق والتوتر في الحياة اليومية.

books.title: الصحة النفسية: دليل شامل لفهم الاضطرابات النفسية
books.author: أحمد عكاشة
books.description: كتاب عربي يغطي الاضطرابات النفسية مثل الاكتئاب والقلق واضطراب ثنائي القطب.

books.title: كيف تتغلب على الأفكار الانتحارية
books.author: محمد عبد العليم
books.description: كتاب عربي يقدم دعماً نفسياً للأشخاص الذين يعانون من الأفكار الانتحارية.

books.title: التوتر النفسي وكيفية التعامل معه

books.description: كتاب عربي يقدم تقنيات لإدارة التوتر النفسي وتحسين الصحة العقلية.

books.title: اضطراب الشخصية الحدية: دليل العلاج

books.description: كتاب عربي يشرح اضطراب الشخصية الحدية ويقدم استراتيجيات علاجية.

books.title: Mind Over Mood: Change How You Feel by Changing the Way You Think
books.author: Dennis Greenberger & Christine A. Padesky
books.description: A CBT workbook for managing depression, anxiety, and mood swings.

books.title: The Body Keeps the Score: Brain, Mind, and Body in the Healing of Trauma
books.author: Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: Explores how trauma affects mental health and offers healing strategies for anxiety and depression.

books.title: Lost Connections: Uncovering the Real Causes of Depression – and the Unexpected Solutions
books.author: Johann Hari
books.description: Investigates social and environmental causes of depression with practical solutions.

books.title: The Mindful Way Through Depression
books.author: Mark Williams, John Teasdale, Zindel Segal, & Jon Kabat-Zinn
books.description: Combines mindfulness and CBT to manage depression and prevent relapse.
